title: 8bar Grunewald Carbon v2 updates gravel bike for bigger off-road adventures
content:
8bar’s affordable Grunewald carbon adventure gravel bike is back with a v2 update that is more off-road-ready than ever to extend your bikepacking trips further into the wilds. Now more of a lightweight dropbar 29er than the original 650b adventure bike, the new Grunewald Carbon v2 is lighter, fits bigger tires (obviously), can haul more […]

The post 8bar Grunewald Carbon v2 updates gravel bike for bigger off-road adventures appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
